Immigration-related sections of 2010 UK party manifestos

data_char_ukimmig2010.Rd

Extracts from the election manifestos of 9 UK political parties from 2010, related to immigration or asylum-seekers.

data_char_ukimmig2010

Format

A named character vector of plain ASCII texts

Examples

data_corpus_ukimmig2010 <-
    corpus(data_char_ukimmig2010,
           docvars = data.frame(party = names(data_char_ukimmig2010)))
metadoc(data_corpus_ukimmig2010, "language") <- "english"
summary(data_corpus_ukimmig2010, showmeta = TRUE)
#> Corpus consisting of 9 documents:
#> 
#>          Text Types Tokens Sentences _language        party
#>           BNP  1125   3280        88   english          BNP
#>     Coalition   142    260         4   english    Coalition
#>  Conservative   251    499        15   english Conservative
#>        Greens   322    679        21   english       Greens
#>        Labour   298    683        29   english       Labour
#>        LibDem   251    483        14   english       LibDem
#>            PC    77    114         5   english           PC
#>           SNP    88    134         4   english          SNP
#>          UKIP   346    723        27   english         UKIP
#> 
#> Source: /Users/kbenoit/Dropbox (Personal)/GitHub/quanteda/quanteda/docs/reference/* on x86_64 by kbenoit
#> Created: Sat Feb  2 14:11:48 2019
